name: Gnomes & Goblins
storyline: Embark on a dream-like journey in this fantasy adventure VR simulation. Encounter goblin inhabitants, become part of their society, and save them from their foe. Freely roam the enchanted forest to discover deeper layers of their mysterious ways and reap the rewards of this magical world.
summary: Gnomes & Goblins is an original indie production from Wevr with MWM and Golem Creations that offers players a unique opportunity to explore an enchanted virtual world created by Jon Favreau (director of The Lion King, The Jungle Book, Chef, Iron Man) in collaboration with VR Director Jake Rowell (theBlu, Call of Duty, Superman Returns).
